print.browserPath.description: PSEUDO:Path to the executable of an alternate browser
print.colourScheme.markdownDescription: PSEUDO:[Stylesheet preview is available online](https://highlightjs.org/static/demo/). Only 'light' versions are offered because paper is white.
print.editorContextMenuItemPosition.mark: PSEUDO:The position of `Print` in the editor context menu
print.editorTitleMenuButton.description: PSEUDO:Print the content of the active editor
print.folder.fileNames.description: PSEUDO:Include file names as section titles when printing content of a folder
print.folder.include.description: PSEUDO:A glob pattern for inclusions when printing the content of a folder. Empty means all.
print.folder.exclude.description: PSEUDO:A glob pattern for exclusions when printing the content of a folder. Files of types that are known to be binary are always excluded.
print.folder.maxFiles.description: PSEUDO:The maximium number of files that folder print will render. For a folder with more files, you get only the summary.
print.folder.maxLines.description: PSEUDO:Upper limit for file size, in lines of text. Files larger than this are ignored.
print.folder.includeFileList.description: PSEUDO:Begin with a list of files when printing the content of a folder.
print.printAndClose.description: PSEUDO:Show the Print dialog when the browser is ready, and try to close the page after printing is done or cancelled
print.renderMarkdown.description: PSEUDO:Render Markdown as HTML when printing
print.logLevel.markdownDescription: PSEUDO:Log level `Error` will log only errors (very few entries) whereas `info` will log errors, warnings and info. `Silly` will log absolutely everything. `Debug` is good for troubleshooting but the log file will grow fast.
